title: Alumni Gym HVAC & Electrical Upgrades
agency: Essex North Shore Agricultural & Technical School District
description: The project consists of upgrades to the HVAC and electrical systems at the ENSATS Alumni Gym Building, including demolition and removal of existing equipment, including equipment in Gallant Hall, and installation of new equipment along with a new smoke detection system.  General Bidders must be DCAMM-certified in HVAC.  Filed Sub-Bid Categories are Roofing & Flashing and Electrical. DCAMM certification required for Filed Sub-Bidders.

title: RFP See Plymouth Travel & Tourism Season Ext. Grant (TTSE)

title: Crocket Circle Water Main Construction
description: The scope of work under this contract includes construction of approximately 1,100 linear feet ofnew, 12-inch PVCO water main, DI pipe fittings and appurtenances. The water main shall connectthe new water storage tank piping (installed under a separate contract), located off Crocket Circle,to the existing piping past the booster pump station on Moore Road.

title: CA 2023-02 Personal Property Valuation Services
description: RFP for Project CA 2023-02 Personal Property Valuation Services.  The City of Marlborough, acting through its Board of Accessors, invites sealed proposals from qualified firms to provide FY24 Personal Property Revaluation Services and FY25- FY26 Personal Property Interim Maintenance Services, with the City's option to renew those services for FY27 and FY28.  RFP documents are available online at www.marlborough-ma.gov/bids.

title: Comprehensive Energy Management Services RFQ
description: Town of Westport hereby seeks Statements of Qualifications for selection of a firm to provide a comprehensive program of Energy Management Services pursuant to M.G.L. Chapter 25A,  Section 11I. The Town intends to select the most qualified responsible contractor per the evaluation criteria contained herein with whom it will enter into a Guaranteed Energy Savings Contract.

title: 24OPRKW1
agency: Department of Elementary and Secondary Education
description: Conduct an evaluation of the ECIG to inform the current Massachusetts Early College (EC) designation by documenting the ways in which, if any, incubator programs that are not yet designated EC and do not align completely with the existing EC designation criteria can successfully deliver EC and expanded access, particularly to historically underserved students.

title: Open space and recreation plan
description: The Town of North Andover is requesting proposals for assistance in the preparation of an update to the 2016 North Andover Open Space and Recreation Plan pursuant to the requirements of the Division of Conservation Services within the Executive Office of Energy and Environmental Affairs and as further described in the Request for Proposals. The complete RFP is available at www.northandoverma.gov -click on Bids and Proposals and then View Open Bids.

title: DHCD2023-31 EA Rolling RFR
agency: Department of Housing and Community Development
description: The Department of Housing and Community Development (DHCD) is soliciting proposals for additional Emergency Assistance (EA) homeless shelter providers. The Emergency Assistance system seeks to make homelessness rare, brief, and non-recurring. Through a combination of increased entries and decreased exits, the EA shelter system is operating near capacity and in need of additional providers to operate new shelter sites.
